edawasa palaka panthiye mardanayen midimata nan desa diwa giya samaharek medawasa ee palaka panthiyata ma wandibhattakam karathi; ee palaka panthiye sihina deshayata nayakathwaya dennata sthriyaka theri path no wima gana kanassallata path wethi.
ada guruwaraya siya wruththiyata adala siyalu katayuthu wenuwen deshapalakayan pasupasa ya yuthuya.

namuth janadhipathithuma me kiyapu kathawata hethuwa api nodanna karunak wenna puluwan.
anthawadi palanayak bohomayak anugamikayin wishwasa kale thama nayaka jons porondu wu lesatama jonstawun ‘porondu deshaya’ wanu athi bawayi.
ihatha waradi kala pudgalayin sambandhayen parikshana pawathwimata anugrahaya dakwana thathwayedi, mewani badu sahana menma eyatath wada dewal kalahaki bawa yuropa sangamaya prakasha kara atha.

rata jathiya raka di  dewlowa giya ranawiruwan shri lanka ithihasaye eda sita meda wana thuru daknata labunu suwishesha lakshanayak wuye shri lankikayan kisidu awasthawaka wenath jathiyak sathu rajyayak ho bhumiyak ayath kara ganimata ho aagam pracharaya kirima sandaha ho satan wadi nothibimayi.
me siddhiyata patalawila hitiye ara rahas parikshaka kandayame eka samajikayek.
muslim pasalwala niwadu dinaye wenasak
manorathnage natyawala uchchathama awasthawan dakinna labuna.
komasariswaraya me bawa pawasuwe eeye (05) pawathi uthsawayak awasanaye di madhya wetha adahas dakwaminuyi.

mita amatharawa madhya ha thorathuru sanniwedanaye adhirajyawadi hasirima, loka saranagatha gataluwa adhirajyawadaye prathipalayaki, wisha mathdrawyayata erehi aragalaya, eeds rogayata erehi aragalaya, kiyubanu wiplawaya saha fidel kasthro, dhanawadaya yatathe swabhawika sampathwala winashaya magin athi wana samajiya balapam, dhanawadaye arbudaya saha tharunayange karyabharaya, ratawala jathika wimukthi aragala sandaha rusiyan wiplawaye balapama, lingika
mama hithanne ee kanthawata dura dakna nuwana thiyenawa "kanthawak washayen gath wita mama hithanne api siyalu deta ma huru wenna oone.
ee anuwa ema alabhaya wenuwen shri lankawata ayath muhudu simawen thawath hektayar 2k port siti wyapruthiya wenuwen labadimata deparshawayama ekanga wi athayi da sadahan.
wasthun menupath mila ganan bhara dimata kama pariksha, aahara padanam wa, rakiya, saha wiyadam wiyadam.
namuth oba eyin mathukaranna hadana punarbhawayak naha kiyana adahasata nam mama ekanga wenne naha.

idiri maha mathiwaranaya sandaha apekshakayeku lesa idiripathwimata merata prabala krikat kridakayeku samaga eksath jathika pakshaya pawath wu sakachcha sarthaka wi athi bawa ema paksha abhyanthara aaranchi marga sandahan kaleya.
ara chanal fo widiyo hem para dakinna athine.

ehidi adahas dakwu web madhyawedinge jathika wyaparaye sabhapathi madhyawedi chathuranga da alwis api pahugiya kalaya purama uthuru,nagenahira menm rata mada pradesha kihipayakama nithiwirodhiwa kriyathmaka wana kebal rupawahini nalika rasak pilibandawa anawaranaya kala.ee witharak newe api bohoma pahadiliwa ee haraha rate jathika aarakshawata siduwana balapam wagema ratata labiya yuthu miliyana gananaka badu mudal nolabi yama sambandhayenda apa wagakiwayuththange awadhanaya yomukala.

sinha lagnayen upan ayage gathiguna rawi himi sinhayehi upa aya aathma shakthiyen yuth diyunu wime thada aasha athi aya we.sithe pawathna wu chiththa shakthiya nisama witeka sathuranta muhunadimatada siduwana awastha atha.aathma wishwashaya ihala heyin oonama wada katayuththak bharagani.ihala balaporoththu athi heyin sulu sulu wada norussayi.aagiya thana pradhanithwayak ho kapi penime hakiyawak sinha lagna himiyata atha.awasana mohotha thek wenas nokarana hitha nisa prasiddiyata pathwe.sihi kalpanawen sukshama lesa katayuthu kala haka.jiwithaya jaya ganimata kendraye kalakanni yoga nopihitunoth boho durata hakiwe.kenekuta palamuwa thama waradak nokarayi.thamata waradak wuwahoth thamada eeta prathichara dakwayi.kumbha lagna himiya tharam paliganimedi sukshama nowe.aadambhara we.thamage ambaudaruwange aadi waradak thamage wadihitiyek pawa penwa denawata kamathi natha.raja pakshika we.anyange garubuhuman labe.hariho waradi wewa thamage adahasama kriyathmaka kirimata uthsaha darayi.badagini isalime daksha we.lokayai rate wegawath palakayo sinha lagnayen upadith.

anka eke pilikakarakayak wana aasanik shariragatha wima nisa minis sirurata sidu karana hani pilibandawa chinaya, bangladeshaya, wiyatnamaya, indiyawa, thayiwanaya, chili, aarjantinawa aadi ratawala sidu karana lada parikshana wishala sankhyawak athi athara, eewa oosteraliyawa, engalanthaya, chinaya, kanadawa aadi wiwidha ratawala piligath widya sangarawala parikshana pathrika wishala gananak magin penwa di atha.

moratu widuhale harsha dewindage wishishta pandu yawima hethuwen kolambaa asoka widuhala samaga pasugiyada moratuwedi pawathi anthar pasal awurudu 19n pahala krikat tharagaye palamu inime jayak wartha kirimata moratu widuhala samathwiya.asoka widuhala palamu inime lakunu 89kata simakaramin harsha lakunu 30kata kadulu 6kda, dewana inime lakunu 44kata kadulu 7k da binda helamin daksha pandu yawimaka nirathawiya.asoka widuhala palamu inima-89 ishan madhusanka 24 (harsha dewinda 30/6, nipun randika 5/2) saha dewana inima- 85 thisara deshan 21 (harsha dewinda 44/7, sachin umayangana 26/3)moratu widuhala palamu inima-103/7 harsha dewinda 24, sandaka pathirana 35/4, ishan madhusanka 16/2).
